name: Google+ Simply wide content
description:
*This version is 0.2.0.6 (beta test release)

This style extends the width of the content of Google+.
(2 column, support over 1280x resolution)
And, forced to hide settings, suggestions, send invitations, circle sharing, game, youtube bar and more.
additional_info:
*In screen except stream, there may be problems such as width restrictions, so it will be out of support.
*This style is applied new google design only.
